response.answer_text: Since oxygen has 2 unpaired electrons (in pi*2px and pi*2py), it's paramagnetic. Nascent oxygen is the oxygen which hasn't bonded covalently with another oxygen atom to form O2. So, it'd be the same
Oxygen is para magnetic as the last two electron go into separate and degenerate the pi orbitals according to the Hund's rule. So it has the unpaired electron , it is para magnetic. .
